version_description:
Do you love seeing full-screen pictures with Eyecon? We have made our photo features even better in this version through enhanced photo suggestions. This release also contains bug fixes and performance improvements.

Continue sending us your feedback to support@eyecon-app.com and make sure to rate us in the app store!

We are excited about the major updates we have been working on for this release! It is only the initial stage of our major update. Feel free to write to us at support@eyecon-app.com for any issues you may have.

What's new:
* Completely new look and feel.
* Tap on contacts from the main page for quick access to call and use your favorite apps.
* 4 new themes.
* Options to choose different contacts list cells sizes.

· Performance improvements and quicker launch time
· Bug fixes

* Do you love colors? We’ve added over 30 themes to our app!
* Bigger is better – we listened to your feedback and redesigned the contact profile pages with larger photos.
* Faster start - we've improved performance for a quicker launch time.

As always, email us at support@eyecon-app.com with any feedback.

We care about your privacy! You can now delete your Eyecon call and chat history.

We have also added an extended menu to make it easier to rate us, like Eyecon on Facebook and invite your friends to the app.

Please continue to send your feedback to support@eyecon-app.com

- Protect yourself from annoying phone calls with our first version of spam protection.
- Enjoy Eyecon in your native language. We have translated the app into Russian, Hindi, French, German ,Spanish and Portuguese.
- We resolved several major bugs for an improved overall app experience.

Please email us at support@eyecon-app.com with your thoughts and suggestions for improvements.

We know our users love photos, and now you can view full-screen photos for outgoing calls with Eyecon.

We have added a "delete all" feature to allow you to more quickly secure your privacy.

We have also worked on some performance improvements and bug fixes.

Please write to us at support@eyecon-app.com with your feedback. Thanks!

Do you want to find names and photos of unknown callers? Use our new search feature to identify numbers. Once we've found your results you can choose to add a contact, WhatsApp, call or search again.

Please write to us at support@eyecon-app.com with any questions or feedback.

We've created a fun and addictive game. Click on the trophy icon to discover how well you know your contacts!

Other features in this version:
- Richer history including details beyond making calls such as WhatsApp, Facebook, etc...
- Turkish translation.

We are always working on expanding our localizations and have translated Eyecon to Arabic and Hebrew. Please write to us at support@eyecon-app.com to volunteer to translate Eyecon to your language!

Additional features in this version:
- Improvements to the contact game
- Performance and bug fixes

We've worked to make sure that our app is totally compatible with iPhone X and fixed some bugs.

Please write to us at support@eyecon-app.com with your feedback. Thanks!
Hot fix for a bug causing Eyecon photos to occasionally disappear.

We've worked on solving some major bugs to improve the overall Eyecon experience.

Please write to us at support@eyecon-app.com with your feedback and suggestions of what features you would like to see us develop.
Hot Fix for a bug causing the app to crash after calls when the history is blank.

*** Exciting new feature ***
We've created a new and easier way to create calendar events. Create quick events with your contacts, recent callers or yourself as a reminder!

Check it out and let us know what you think by writing to support@eyecon-app.com.

In this version, we've fixed a major bug and worked on performance improvements.

We also added an option for users to delete contact photos and pick a default phone number per contact.

Please write to us at support@eyecon-app.com with your feedback.
Fix of critical bug.

* We've worked on bug fixes and performance improvements.
* Contacts us at support@eyecon-app.com with any questions or feedback.

* We are always working on expanding our localizations and have translated Eyecon to Polish thank to the hard work of a volunteer. Please write to us at support@eyecon-app.com if you are able to help us translate Eyecon into
your language!
* We've worked on bug fixes and performance improvements.
* Contacts us at support@eyecon-app.com with any questions or feedback.

Now we can find even more photos for your contacts by connecting Twitter, Facebook and Google with Eyecon. Try out our new syncing photos feature and let us know what you think!

We've also worked on bug fixes and performance improvements. Contact us at support@eyecon-app.com with any questions or feedback.

We know how important contacts are to our users and have worked on making improvements to our contact profile pages including:

- Ability to share photos we've found of your contacts
- Delete contact button
- Better zoom in on your contact images

We've also fixed some bugs and improved overall app performance.

As always, write to us at support@eyecon-app.com with your feedback and make sure and rate us 5 stars!

We know how important contacts are to our users and have worked on making improvements to our contact profile pages including:

- Ability to share and save photos of your contacts
- Delete contact button
- Better zoom in on your contact images

We've also fixed some bugs and improved overall app performance.

As always, write to us at support@eyecon-app.com with your feedback and make sure and rate us 5 stars!

We've added an enhanced number pad with a better design and more capabilities including:
1. SMS messages
2. WhatsApp messages
3. Reverse lookup

We've also worked on solving a major performance bug to give you more and better photos.

Please write to us at support@eyecon-app.com with any feedback!

We've added Facebook to reverse lookup and solved some important bugs!

We've also made Eyecon compatible with iOS 12.

Please write to us at support@eyecon-app.com with your feedback. Thanks!

We've added Facebook to reverse lookup and solved some important bugs!
We've also made Eyecon compatible with iOS 12.

Please write to us at support@eyecon-app.com with your feedback. Thanks!

We’ve added a settings section to give you even more options of how to use Eyecon and manage your account.

We’ve also squelched some pesky bugs to improve performance.

Please write to us at support@eyecon-app.com with your feedback. Thanks!

- We've worked on bug fixes and performance improvements.
- Contacts us at support@eyecon-app.com with any questions or feedback.

Do you want to know unknown numbers calling you? Try our improved reverse lookup to find more names and photos.

If you haven’t joined our Premium version yet, now’s the time. We have lots of exciting features on our roadmap for Premium users and upgrading to a Lifetime package means you’ll get access to everything we have planned without paying anything extra.

As always, write to us at support@eyecon-app.com with feedback and suggestions. We love hearing from you!

As always, write to us at support@eyecon-app.com with feedback and suggestions. We love hearing from you!

Blink and you'll miss it. We've improved our performance for a quicker and smoother experience. Enjoy our new and improved dialer, photos and reverse lookup.

Leave us a 5-star review and write to us at support@eyecon-app.com with any feedback you have.
